testcase.classname: Checkout functionality of basket item added
testcase.name: User should be able to perform the checkout and insert their information
testcase.system-out: Given I am at the login page................................................passed And I click the username textbox............................................passed Then I insert the standard_user username....................................passed Then I click the password textbox...........................................passed And I insert the secret_sauce password......................................passed When I click the login button...............................................passed Then I should be navigated to the products page.............................passed Given I am on the product page..............................................passed When I click the add to cart button for a product...........................passed And I click the product basket icon.........................................passed Then I should see the Sauce Labs Backpack product I added to the basket.....passed Given I am at the checkout page.............................................passed When I click the checkout button............................................passed Then I should be navigated to the information page..........................passed And I click the First Name text box.........................................passed And I insert the testFirstName firstname....................................passed And I click the Last Name text box..........................................passed And I insert the testLastName lastname......................................passed And I click the Zip/Postal Code textbox.....................................passed And I insert the testPostalCode zip/postal code.............................passed When I click the continue button............................................passed Then I should be navigated to the checkout overview page....................passed
